ygData.subject: Re: War
ygData.msgSnippet: (Well if you re not TheCODE, then who the hell are you?) The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Unitron/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Serpentor/War Machine: Dark One

Subject: Re: War
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

(Well if you're not TheCODE, then who the hell are you?)


The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Unitron/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark 
Claw/Serpentor/War Machine:



Dark One dived, firing off two missiles at the Mafia base.

---

Breakdown yelled out as the disk plunged into him.  Transforming into robot 
mode, he ripped the disk out of his chest, a squirt of blue mech-fluid 
landing on the ground.  "Slag it!" he yelled, raising his grenade launcher, 
firing off a grenade at Blender, not sure if the fool was to far away to 
shoot.

---

Pyro cursed as he saw Stronghold go by, firing off three fire balls at 
Shockaract.

---

Hiss cursed as he got caught in autogun fire, ducking back.

---

Scavenger fired off explosive rounds at one charge, rolling away from the 
other.  He let out a yell as the explosion's shock wave and flames sent him 
stumbling back several feet.

---

Demon Wulf fired off three optic blasts at the Mafia Base.  "Brother's, bring 
their puny fortress to be one with the Void!" he ordered.

---

Flesh Ripper fired off three laser bolts at the Mafia Base.

---

Dark Claw formed two blue orbs in his hands, throwing the explosive balls of 
energy at the Mafia Base.  "I grow weary of this pathetic battle."

"Do as your told!" Demon Wulf yelled back with a snarl.

---

Minion leaped into the air, attaching as the right arm of War Machine.

---

Chaos yelled out as autogun fire cut into his stomach, mech-fluid leaking.  
He jumped into the air barely able to ignore the pain, his body taking the 
shape of an arm, hand and all.  He attached as War Machine's left arm.

---

War Machine pounded his left fist against his chest, letting out a roar.  
"NONE SHALL WITHSTAND THE MIGHT OF WAR MACHINE".  He raised his wrists, 
firing off three laser bolts from each (barrels extending from wrists), six 
bolts in relative size to the 45 foot behemoth heading for the Mafia Base.

---

Unitron looked at War Machine.  "Another idiotic gestalt.  Those things are 
to dangerous..." he said slowly, firing 25 rapid laser bolts in a strafing 
run.

---

Serpentor screamed as an autogun blast caught him the face, forming a huge 
gash in his forehead, his face charred.  "WHY ME!?  WHY IN THE PIT IS IT 
ALWAYS ME!?!?!?!?!"
